elements.2211.03132_7c4ff1d5f97bd8b13ad8007c11ed0: Reconfigurable intelligent surface (RIS) is a disruptive technology to enhance the performance of physical-layer key generation (PKG) thanks to its ability to smartly customize the radio environments
elements.2211.03132_f4d82a735db09df7ccdafb0411f2f: Existing RIS-assisted PKG methods are mainly based on the idealistic assumption of an independent and identically distributed (i.i.d.) channel model at both the base station (BS) and the RIS
elements.2211.03132_ce21e9187fd957b3280bf4db9ffe2: However, the i.i.d. model is inaccurate for a typical RIS in an isotropic scattering environment and neglecting the existence of channel spatial correlation would possibly degrade the PKG performance
elements.2211.03132_7662a46bcb63dfd98e4d66d812521: In this paper, we establish a general spatially correlated channel model and propose a new channel probing framework based on the transmit and the reflective beamforming
elements.2211.03132_e348615659acced54427bc0d0065f: We derive a closed-form key generation rate (KGR) expression and formulate an optimization problem, which is solved by using the low-complexity Block Successive Upper-bound Minimization (BSUM) with Mirror-Prox method
elements.2211.03132_7801bb9f99f975924d8e248d91f60: Simulation results show that compared to the existing methods based on the i.i.d. fading model, our proposed method achieves about
elements.2211.03132_5868a93153c312eb63481fa11d403: dB transmit power gain when the spacing between two neighboring RIS elements is a quarter of the wavelength
elements.2211.03132_c4abf31074bedff621333fd4990d2: Also, the KGR increases significantly with the number of RIS elements while that increases marginally with the number of BS antennas.
elements.2211.03132_f0f7a1922ef49083d521da939776b: Physical layer security, secret key generation, reconfigurable intelligent surface, spatially correlated channels.
elements.2211.03132_0caa6225ba1917e66bb61fa4b8dfd: In the last decades, the throughput of wireless communication systems has achieved a 1000-fold capacity increase
elements.2211.03132_4335f61e1c01355d7c868bf9c8a55: At the same time, an enormous amount of confidential information, including financial information and trade secrets, has been exchanged via wireless channels
elements.2211.03132_85e4b9bdc22fe61282f9c63b4fbd5: However, the broadcast property of wireless medium makes wireless transmissions vulnerable to security breaches, such as passive and active attacks by potential eavesdroppers
elements.2211.03132_7b0036025ae85966e21355380a83e: Traditionally, security communication is guaranteed by the public key cryptography techniques adopted in the application layer
elements.2211.03132_a907bd894f4a5a4ca3cc7deada37d: However, the public key in those traditional methods needs to be distributed to the involved legitimate ends in advance, which is difficult to realize in mobile and ad-hoc wireless networks.
elements.2211.03132_d2efcd98bcf24cf98fbb5a0eaf2e3: Alternatively, physical-layer key generation (PKG) is recognized as a promising paradigm to tackle this problem
elements.2211.03132_c34190c262a5baf0f303e11ac421d: By leveraging the inherent random and reciprocal nature of wireless channels, PKG naturally establishes symmetric keys between the legitimate parties
elements.2211.03132_711f575ebf53b0d744db3c82e14a1: Also, due to its potential to achieve information-theoretic security cost-effectively, PKG has been applied to practical systems, such as WiFi, LoRa, and Zigbee,
elements.2211.03132_c5ae9466dee94c9b4aa4edf701a12: The general PKG procedures can be divided into four consecutive stages: channel sounding, quantization, information reconciliation, and privacy amplification
elements.2211.03132_8e7555a400ead36ba0528ec09c982: Specifically, for the channel probing stage, Alice and Bob alternatingly exchange pilots and perform channel estimations in a coherence time slot to extract correlated channel features
elements.2211.03132_77ab273c3c6ac25f86698705ef961: These features are converted into binary bits in the quantization stage
elements.2211.03132_408b2647c7b92c8cfe943163af070: Then, in the information reconciliation stage, the mismatched bits between Alice and Bob are corrected via error-correcting codes
elements.2211.03132_4c9a6fc93bd72c7b91b9a07e4b266: At last, during the privacy amplification stage, Alice and Bob discard the bits that could be potentially leaked in the previous stages
elements.2211.03132_5b059ba37ed893909705d5e708b26: It can be observed that the feasibility of the PKG is strongly associated with the properties of wireless channels
elements.2211.03132_34f0c447590eb6c0fce1b57e8ec90: Moreover, the existence of rich-scattering and dynamically varying channels is the essential premise to ensure the security level offered by the generated secret key
elements.2211.03132_b34c3d6c9ec375a14b0504aabf206: Unfortunately, the above condition can hardly be satisfied in some harsh propagation scenarios, such as shadowed environments
elements.2211.03132_f0cfe490b142c3c87c355a4bd96f2: As such, various previous works aim to enhance the PKG performance in these propagation scenarios to a certain extent by utilizing cooperative relaying
elements.2211.03132_f82d70c0c39681aaa1295cc903993: However, the relay-based PKG approaches admit two main demerits
elements.2211.03132_615857a13d93c5c901bf30e00f796: First, the key rate has limited growth unless the relay node keeps moving all the time to introduce randomness to the secret key
elements.2211.03132_1b11326eff4f3840d3233c4cca836: Second, deploying active relays incurs high hardware costs and energy consumption
elements.2211.03132_9aa30815f67b649c6572c31b9ee8b: As a result, a new cost-effective and energy-effective paradigm that is capable of controlling the propagation environment is needed to facilitate PKG.
elements.2211.03132_5e16576735b684b43c5a2d2d55c39: As a remedy, reconfigurable intelligent surface (RIS) was proposed to address this emerging need
elements.2211.03132_f404cb3b7a0043f9e84558443b50a: In particular, RIS is a programmable and reconfigurable metasurface consisting of a large number of low-cost passive elements, e.g., printed dipoles and phase shifters
elements.2211.03132_2ee094e523634ea0bfe9f4ab070cd: These elements are controlled collaboratively to alter the signal propagation environment
elements.2211.03132_53c547ecdc82177a561bf872bfbb2: Hence, RIS provides a cost-effective approach to enable the customization of favorable wireless propagation environments for PKG while avoiding the deployment of power-hungry and expensive cooperative relays.
elements.2211.03132_2c4a37d47d527db5946f69d7256f8: to fully unleash the potential of RIS for effective KGR provisioning, the reflection coefficients of RIS elements have to be appropriately optimized.
elements.2211.03132_69531acf002e456f1079e3490a2ca: Inspired by this, several works have been proposed on the optimization design of RIS-assisted PKG systems, such as [15]
elements.2211.03132_8c11b3660f73ffe8335c4588b8269: starting from single-user systems to multi-user systems
elements.2211.03132_bbc9491b538e43643a90dbdf0445a: considered a simple scenario with a single-user and independent eavesdropping channels
elements.2211.03132_7dcc9f9a8cd18597794becd8b2b93: They derived the expression of the KGR capacity and optimized the switch states of RIS units globally when the number of available RIS units is limited
elements.2211.03132_961ee88ec72eb2376b59d3609b2b6: Furthermore, RIS-assisted PKG systems comprising multiple eavesdroppers with correlated eavesdropping channels were investigated in
elements.2211.03132_e1dd836ca3c57b1670521d1f0a1a8: , where the authors designed a semidefinite relaxation (SDR) and successive convex approximation (SCA)-based algorithm to maximize the lower bound of the secret key capacity
elements.2211.03132_24937a94cc37ea296edbf3b3ed122: Despite the fruitful research in the literature, most of the above works considered only the single-user case, e.g.,
elements.2211.03132_5d9046b1e6bd8fab6cb26211478fd: , and their results are not applicable to practical cases having multiple users
elements.2211.03132_5405108d0096c32b7ccd8836c4fa8: , the authors introduced a RIS-assisted multiuser key generation scheme and optimized the RIS phase shifts in the presence of independent and correlated eavesdropping channels.
elements.2211.03132_6b3e15d0b84c478f4a9aff353bcc7: Nevertheless, all of these works are based on the independent and identically distributed (i.i.d.) Rayleigh fading model for the RIS-related channels
elements.2211.03132_13f14399ce2bf6a2fad754510db6e: In practice, the non-negligible spatial correlations naturally exist among RIS elements due to their sub-wavelength sizes and distributions
elements.2211.03132_351b8802e29f10860c43c9f93066c: More importantly, these correlations may jeopardize the PKG performance if they are not taken into account in the system design
elements.2211.03132_ed48c4ccaaecf85ec4ca6a24fdbb9: In addition, only a single-antenna BS was considered in these works, e.g.,
elements.2211.03132_9d2275d597c7ba795ef9ee4c09cd7: [17], and it is not straightforward to extend these existing results to the case of multi-antenna, which has a more complicated model, and the reflective beamforming at RIS and transmit beamforming at the BS need to be jointly optimized
elements.2211.03132_b67d08c34ce89b93c5a3d7eb3dbe0: Indeed, the design of RIS-assisted PKG methods in multi-antenna spatially correlated channels is of utmost importance but it has not been studied in the existing works, yet
elements.2211.03132_9bbfa43c5250d11a5806ee7c8051a: To address the above issues, this paper investigates the RIS-assisted PKG in a multiple-input single-output multiple-eavesdropper (MISOME) system, with the consideration of the spatial correlation at both the BS and the RIS.
elements.2211.03132_38a32ed3528de471e265318e8ed7f: The main contributions of this paper are as follows.
elements.2211.03132_7c1f2fbd71acb5e7c2d1e7fc3af14: We propose a transmit and reflective beamforming-based RIS-assisted PKG framework in multi-antenna spatially correlated channels
elements.2211.03132_93b1ccd0c245a1e6cb8f20377c950: We derive the closed-form KGR expression as a function of the reflective beamforming at the RIS and the transmit beamforming at the BS
elements.2211.03132_55c3d823a8cf8ae86f3337e34c4ff: We formulate the design of beamforming as an optimization problem to maximize the minimum KGR for the worst-case eavesdropper channel
elements.2211.03132_20856364fe04ad307ffa58e5a5c94: the beamforming designed for the correlated model outperforms that for the i.i.d. model while the KGR gain increases with the channel correlation with the proposed design.
elements.2211.03132_167e11b1095f2462f139da45e1de9: To tackle the resulting non-convex optimization problem, we present an effective Block Successive Upper-bound Minimization (BSUM)-based algorithm
elements.2211.03132_2b7a5a545cdf63b7dd0cd73f35f6d: We prove that the BSUM algorithm yields a non-decreasing convergence over iterations.
elements.2211.03132_e64456def48018e6744c395cb33d0: Then, to solve the non-smooth convex problem in each iteration of the BSUM algorithm in a complexity-effective manner, we reformulate it as an equivalent convex-concave saddle point problem and employ the Mirror-Prox method to solve it with closed-form updates.
elements.2211.03132_c0a61df23f2f7c38c3592659e59fa: Simulation results show that compared to existing methods based on the i.i.d. fading model, the proposed design achieves about
elements.2211.03132_9641ca28c7315a5d6bfbf92b9a26d: dB transmit power gain when the spacing between two neighbouring RIS elements is a quarter of the wavelength and the BS antenna correlation
elements.2211.03132_2422f450f639ee5d83bfb962f6797: Also, the KGR gain increases with the spatial correlation at both the BS and the RIS
elements.2211.03132_2c1f3ce21f98ec79788d30c1f10d8: Moreover, the computational time of the proposed algorithm is reduced approximately by two orders of magnitude compared to that of the commonly adopted algorithms, e.g., alternating optimization, semidefinite relaxation, successive convex approximation with Gaussian randomization (ASSG), while achieving a similar KGR performance.
elements.2211.03132_479c5f7d34d9e27af675fe8502f31: Note that in the conference version of this paper
elements.2211.03132_4492ae1a9c1104c2b206d87dbb24c: the eavesdropping channels are independent of the legitimate channels and derived the optimal beamforming to maximize the KGR
elements.2211.03132_48be0bc1f4a3e4fcda536198e1b6a: In this paper, we generalize it by taking into account the channel correlation between Eve and the legitimate parties
elements.2211.03132_f107cdbb95a2e3a805439b97a8261: We provide a general KGR expression and formulate an optimization problem, which can be solved by the proposed low-complexity BSUM algorithm.

elements.2211.03132_3f05bbaad0843e999e602f13f4c6d: In this paper, we introduced a transmit and reflective beamforming-based RIS-assisted PKG framework in multi-antenna spatially correlated channels
elements.2211.03132_0865f2807a16c7405cb7b18f587ba: Based on this framework, we derived the general closed-form KGR expression and formulated an optimization problem to maximize the minimum KGR
elements.2211.03132_449670198c9511a2bc89cc619d366: We designed a BSUM with a Mirror-Prox algorithm to tackle the non-convex optimization problem
elements.2211.03132_ac1abadcd0f6455e63ec632debbb7: Our analysis proved that the KGR increases with the spatial correlation between the BS antennas and RIS elements
elements.2211.03132_59c210d94bf49bbc7f7d8d9d1d376: In particular, the KGR can be improved significantly with the increase of RIS elements, while it increases with diminishing returns when the number of BS antennas is sufficiently large
elements.2211.03132_ac982f428cd3d73137ebb0ec527ab: Numerical results showed that our method achieves higher KGR and lower BDR compared to the benchmarks in the same eavesdropping condition.
